newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak FinMin 4-wk T-bill yield rises to 13.64 pct.
newsitem.headline: Slovak FinMin 4-wk T-bill yield rises to 13.64 pct.

text.p: Average yield at an auction of four-week Slovak Finance Ministry treasury bills rose to 13.64 percent from 12.55 percent in the last auction of similar bills, the central bank said on Wednesday.
The ministry does not announce the amount of bills on offer at its auctions.
